instruction: Can you make my computer bring back the last tab I shut down?

minimal: `CLICK` the '+' icon next to tabs (or `PRESS` Ctrl+T) to create a new tab
`CLICK` any tab to switch to it
`PRESS` Ctrl+Tab to cycle to the next tab
`PRESS` Ctrl+Shift+Tab to cycle to the previous tab
`PRESS` Ctrl+[1-8] to jump to a specific tab (e.g., Ctrl+2 for the second tab)
`PRESS` Ctrl+9 to jump to the last tab
`PRESS` Ctrl+Shift+T to reopen the most recently closed tab
suboptimal: `CLICK` to create a new tab (or `PRESS` Ctrl+T)
`PRESS` Ctrl+Shift+T repeatedly to restore multiple closed tabs
